title: Bold Design Watch face
summary: Let your style speak about you.
description: Customise your Smart watch to match your clothes or your mood. There are hundreds of different color combinations to choose from.Features:â˜… Digital designâ˜… Hundreds of color combinationsâ˜… 6 Unique Bold fontsBold Watch Face works on both rectangular smart watches such as the Samsung Gear Live, LG G Watch, Sony Smartwatch 3 & ASUS Zen watch and round smart watches such as the Moto 360 & LG G R.Note: The watch may not appear right away on your device after installing. After installing the application, go to the android wear app on your phone -> Settings and "Re sync apps" and wait for some time.
descriptionHTML:
Customise your Smart watch to match your clothes or your mood. There are hundreds of different color combinations to choose from.

Features:
★ Digital design
★ Hundreds of color combinations
★ 6 Unique Bold fonts

Bold Watch Face works on both rectangular smart watches such as the Samsung Gear Live, LG G Watch, Sony Smartwatch 3 & ASUS Zen watch and round smart watches such as the Moto 360 & LG G R.

Note: The watch may not appear right away on your device after installing. After installing the application, go to the android wear app on your phone -> Settings and "Re sync apps" and wait for some time.
comments: Nice design Looks great on my LG G watch ðŸ˜ƒ
